item.description: Greetings ICC members, it's been too long since we all got together! Join us for a summer get together in my the back yard, this will be a casual meeting with no set topic, but time to catch up with members and get ideas for upcoming meetings. I'll have light snacks, please BYOB. Bring a bathing suit and towel if you want to dip into the hot tub (not so hot in the summertime).
item.how_to_find_us: From Hartford: 84 East to 384 East, take Exit 4, left off exit, right at light across from Highland Park Market. Follow 2 miles into Bolton, left onto Birch Mountain Road Ext., 3rd house on right.

group.name: Independent Creative Club of Greater Hartford

item.name: ICC Happy Hour
